name: Spaceship Bounce
description:
This game is a work in progress. Even though it's playable, it's far from complete and you may encounter some bugs.

How to play:

The spaceship is moving automatically in a diagonal line, and it bounces off of the walls.

You can only reverse the right/left direction by (Clicking) anywhere on the screen or by pressing (Space). (if it's moving right and you click it will move left and vice versa).

You can pause the game by pressing (Esc).

You get 1 point for every obstacle you avoid, and you also get 1 point if you hit the right or left wall.

Every 10 points you score, the top wall will move up slightly, and the speed of the game will increase.
